1370: Batten moved to Bloemendaelse straet.B.3 after marriage.
Got married to Heylewigis at age 32 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Saxiardis, at age 33.
1372: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Emgelberna, at age 34.
1374: Lost daughter Saxiardis when Saxiardis was 4 years old.
1375: Had a son with Heylewigis, Syuardus, at age 37.
1376: Had a son with Heylewigis, Wernerus, at age 38.
1377: Had a son with Heylewigis, Deghen, at age 39.
1378: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Woltwigis, at age 40.
1379: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Iris, at age 41.
1383: Had a son with Heylewigis, Adolfus, at age 45.
